info.name: Hotel-Room Api
info.description:
**Description**

This is a hotel-management api that allows for creation of rooms, room-types, users and also other endpoints as well.

**Things To Know**

1. By default, all users created are assigned guest roles that can only create rooms, fetch room-types and perform all other activities **EXCEPT** creating, editing and deleting room-types which only the admin can do.
2. To login as an admin, you need to use the following credentials: "email": adminchinyere98@gmail.com, "password": adminchi98234.
3. Before performing any operation apart from creating and login users, you need to authenticate. To do this, you need to get the token from login and put it in the bearer as shown below in the endpoints.
4. Please note that you can only update, read and delete the current user logged in based on the token. **YOU CAN NOT SEE ALL USERS ONLY THE LOGGED IN USER.**

**Description**

This is a post end point that allows a user to create a room-type.

**Things To know**

To create a room-type, you need to do the following:

- You need to be authenticated and authorized. Only admin can create a room-type but must first be logged in as an admin.
    

EndFragment

StartFragment

**Description**

This is a get end point that allows a user to fetch all rooms.

**Things To know**

To fetch all rooms, you need to do the following:

- You need to be authenticated. Both users and admin can fetch a room but must first be authenticated.
- You can add optional params such as search by name, room-type or min and max-price

**Description**

This is a post end point that allows to create a user.

**Things To know**

To create a user, you need to do the following:

- Both users and admin can create a user. Aunthentication is not required.
- To create a user, pls input the following fields: "name": "your name", "email": "your email", "password": "your password".
- Please note that **YOU CAN NOT REGISTER THE SAME EMAIL MORE THAN ONCE.**
- On creating a user, you would get a token that can be used to login and perform other activities
- Also note by default, a user is created as a guest.

StartFragment

**Description**

This is a post end point that allows to login a user.

**Things To know**

To login a user, you need to do the following:

- Both users and admin can login. Aunthentication is not required.
- To login a user, pls input the following fields:  "email": "your email", "password": "your password".
- On login a user, you would get a token that can be used to perform other activities
    

EndFragment

StartFragment

**Description**

This is a get end point that allows a user to fetch **ONLY** his own profile.

**Things To know**

To get your own profile, you need to do the following:

- You need to be authenticated. Both users and admin can get their individual profile but must first be authenticated.
- You need to be logged in.
- The token gotten from logging in is what would be used to authenticate your profile.
    

EndFragment

StartFragment

**Description**

This is a patch end point that allows a user to update **ONLY** his own profile.

**Things To know**

To update your own profile, you need to do the following:

- You need to be authenticated. Both users and admin can update their individual profile but must first be authenticated.
- You need to be logged in.
- The token gotten from logging in is what would be used to authenticate your profile.
- Then go the the body and update whatever you want to update.
    

EndFragment

StartFragment

**Description**

This is a delete end point that allows a user to delete **ONLY** his own profile.

**Things To know**

To delete your own profile, you need to do the following:

- You need to be authenticated. Both users and admin can delete their individual profile but must first be authenticated.
- You need to be logged in.
- The token gotten from logging in is what would be used to authenticate your profile and then delete it.
